00020 /** \file
00021  \brief Dump a single value in a db as height in a KML document
00022  */
00023 
00024 #ifndef __SINGLEHEIGHT_H
00025 #define __SINGLEHEIGHT_H
00026 
00027 #include <stdlib.h>
00028 #include <stdio.h>
00029 
00030 #include "sqlite3.h"
00031 
00032 
00033 /// print single db column as height in kml, normalised to maximum height
00034 /** 
00035  \param db the sqlite3 database the data is in
00036  \param f the file to output the data to
00037  \param name the name of the document to output this as
00038  \param desc the description of the document to output this as
00039  \param columnname the columnname to dump it as
00040  \param height the max height to normalise everything to
00041  \param defaultvis the default visilibity [1 for on, 0 for off]
00042  \param start the start time we want to pull data for
00043  \param end the end time we want to pull data for
00044  */
00045 void kmlvalueheight(sqlite3 *db, FILE *f, const char *name, const char *desc, const char *columnname, int height, int defaultvis, double start, double end, int trip);
00046 
00047 
00048 #endif //__SINGLEHEIGHT_H
00049
